dateline.placeName: OFFICE OF ALL THE YEAR ROUND,

body.p: Mr. Charles Dickens begs to thank the writer of the paper entitled | “A Day in the Desert”Unidentified. for having done him the favor to offer it as a contribution to these pages. He much regrets, however, that it is not suited to the requirements of All the Year Round. The manuscript will be returned under cover, if applied for as above.The note in Pilgrim Letters 11, p. 514, 'Clearly sent by one of the Office staff', is incorrect.
